page.title: 17SHOPS
page.content:
{ Family Butcher} Mr. Boon trades under the name of Williams. He lives over the shop. He buys animals from Chelford Market and slaughters them himself on his own premises. Here are some typical prices - beef - middle rump - Â£2.10 / lb - pork - shoulder - Â£1.12 / lb - lamb - shoulder - Â£1.10 / lb
{Bruce Bedford & Co. Farm Services This is a family shop which sells general hardware, small farm equipment, heavy duty clothing and undertakes minor repairs. 90% of the customers are farmers.
{General Food Shops} There are two of these.
{Antique Shop This is combined with a hairdresser.
